fact_text: The Umatilla County Sheriff's Office has issued the following release on road closures in the area due to flooding: Bingham Road Milton-Freewater: Mill Creek Road Walla Walla River Road closed at 15th Street Bridge to end of road at Harris Park Couse Creek Road—Walla Walla River east to Walla Walla River Road Spofford Road closed at intersection Milton Cemetery Road south to Walla Walla River Road.
